entry.title: Trump doesn't refute false Kamala Harris birther theory

media:group.media:title: Trump doesn't refute false Kamala Harris birther theory
media:group.media:description: At a press briefing, Donald Trump did not refute a false birther theory about Senator Kamala Harris (D-CA), telling the reporter who asked about it that he "will take a look." CNN's Jim Acosta called it "a new low" for the president. #Trump #Election2020 #CNN #News

entry.title: Keilar: Instead of trying to provide stability, Trump did this

media:group.media:title: Keilar: Instead of trying to provide stability, Trump did this
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brianna Keiler gives her take on Trump's recent media appearances where he appeared deflated covering various topics from the pandemic to the election. #CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden says all governors should mandate masks for 3 months

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden says all governors should mandate masks for 3 months
media:group.media:description:
Presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden called for governors to implement mask mandates for the next three months, saying that doing so would save 40,000 Americans' lives. "Every single American should be wearing a mask when they're outside for the next three months as a minimum," the former vice president told reporters after he and his running mate, California Sen. Kamala Harris, received a briefing on the pandemic from public health experts. Wearing masks, he said, "is going to get our kids back to school sooner and safer" and would "get our businesses back long-term." "Look, this is America. Be a patriot," Biden said in a message directed at those resistant to wearing masks. "Protect your fellow citizens. Step up. Do the right thing."
#Biden #CNN #News

entry.title: Doctors baffled by Covid-19 'long hauler' patients

media:group.media:title: Doctors baffled by Covid-19 'long hauler' patients
media:group.media:description: For some patients diagnosed with coronavirus, the symptoms can linger on for months. CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta spoke with some of the so-called "long haulers" who are living a nightmare that has medical experts scratching their heads. #CNN #News

entry.title: Why Joe Biden picked Kamala Harris as his VP

media:group.media:title: Why Joe Biden picked Kamala Harris as his VP
media:group.media:description:
Ever since former Vice President Joe Biden announced he would be choosing a woman as his VP candidate, speculation ran rampant about who it would be. In mid-August, just a week ahead of the Democratic National Convention, he announced it would be California Sen. Kamala Harris. Chris Cillizza explains why.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Kamala Harris is Joe Biden's running mate https://www.cnn.com/politics/live-news/2020-election-biden-vp-pick/index.html
Harris confronts Biden over past efforts to block busing https://www.cnn.com/2019/06/28/politics/biden-vs-harris-democratic-debate/index.html
Here's why Joe Biden chose Kamala Harris as his VP https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/11/politics/joe-biden-kamala-harris-vp/index.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out whatâ€™s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #KamalaHarris

entry.title: 'Um, wow': Trump's briefing remarks stun John Berman

media:group.media:title: 'Um, wow': Trump's briefing remarks stun John Berman
media:group.media:description: CNN's John Berman and Kaitlan Collins discuss President Donald Trump repeating the same exact talking points during his coronavirus briefings. #CNN #News

entry.title: How Kamala Harris' Indian roots shaped her political views

media:group.media:title: How Kamala Harris' Indian roots shaped her political views
media:group.media:description: Presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden named Kamala Harris as his vice presidential pick, making the California senator the first Black and South Asian American woman to run on a major political party's presidential ticket. Harris was raised by her Indian mother. CNN's Vedika Sud speaks to her extended family in India. #CNN #News #CNNI

entry.title: Chelsea Clinton fights misinformation on vaccine safety

media:group.media:title: Chelsea Clinton fights misinformation on vaccine safety
media:group.media:description: While some families in the US are concerned about the potential effects of taking a vaccine, others are exploiting fears by spreading misinformation online. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen speaks with vaccine advocate Chelsea Clinton about the battle for facts. #CNN #News

entry.title: Widow of Harris staffer: Kamala dropped everything to be with us

media:group.media:title: Widow of Harris staffer: Kamala dropped everything to be with us
media:group.media:description: Beth Foster Gayle, the widow of Sen. Kamala Harris's former press secretary Tyrone Gayle, tells CNN's Anderson Cooper how Harris reacted to her husband's cancer diagnosis, and how she was there for him in his last days. #CNN #News

entry.title: Biden, Harris take aim at Trump in first campaign event

media:group.media:title: Biden, Harris take aim at Trump in first campaign event
media:group.media:description:
Presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden and his running mate Kamala Harris used their first 2020 campaign event to attack President Donald Trump's time in office and draw a distinction between the president's behavior and Biden's.
#2020Elections #News #CNN

entry.title: Who is Kamala Harris' husband, Douglas Emhoff?

media:group.media:title: Who is Kamala Harris' husband, Douglas Emhoff?
media:group.media:description: Sen. Kamala Harris' husband, Douglas Emhoff, was right by her side during her 2020 presidential campaign. Now, he could become the nation's first "second man" after his wife was chosen by presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden as his running mate. CNN's Kyung Lah reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump praises GOP candidate despite her QAnon support

media:group.media:title: Trump praises GOP candidate despite her QAnon support
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump praised a QAnon supporter who is on the verge of becoming a Republican member of Congress, tweeting that Marjorie Taylor Greene is "a real winner" after her primary victory. CNN's Manu Raju reports some Republicans who criticized her extreme and racist remarks are now supporting her. #CNN #News

entry.title: Kamala Harris: 'Momala' is the title that means the most

media:group.media:title: Kamala Harris: 'Momala' is the title that means the most
media:group.media:description: Presumptive Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris (D-CA) says that she's held many titles throughout her career, but being known as "Momala" to her kids is the title that means the most to her. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'Joy in my soul': Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee on Kamala Harris as Biden's VP pick

media:group.media:title: 'Joy in my soul': Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee on Kamala Harris as Biden's VP pick
media:group.media:description: Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee (D-TX) tells CNN's Brooke Baldwin what it means to have Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden pick Kamala Harris as his running mate. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'Finding Freedom' author: Meghan and Kate 'didn't connect'

media:group.media:title: 'Finding Freedom' author: Meghan and Kate 'didn't connect'
media:group.media:description: CNN's Rosemary Church speaks with Omid Scobie, co-author of the newly released book "Finding Freedom," about the challenges Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, faced as members of the British royal family. #CNN #News
